attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IF WE EVER HAD  AN HONEST  REFERENDUM THERE WOULD NO DOUBT BE A MAJORITY  WHO WANT TO LEAVE EUROPE. DOES ANYONE HAVE THE COURAGE TO ASK THE BRITISH PEOPLE. PLEASE SIGN TO COME OUT OF EUROPE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
